item.description: These are messages you never send — even to someone you know.

item.title: Ric Flair Slams Recent Promo Targeting Charlotte, ‘It Was Hurtful’
item.description: Ric Flair reacts to Tiffany Stratton’s controversial promo targeting Charlotte Flair ahead of WrestleMania. He wasn't happy about it.

item.title: iRobot’s Latest Roomba Will Keep Your Carpets Dry
item.description: The new iRobot Roomba Max 705 Combo Robot has a cover to stop the mop from soaking your carpets
